about_the_game:
Create news bots, feed aggregators, and more with the RSS Feeds extension pack!

RSS is a web feed protocol that allows its consumers to stay up-to-date on frequently-updated content, like news articles, blogs, and podcasts. This extension pack adds at least a dozen new blocks and the ability to consume RSS feeds directly from your project.

With the Piecewise RSS Feeds add-on, you can:

  • Easily monitor RSS feeds for new items and changes
  • Fetch RSS feed metadata
  • Fetch RSS feed items, descriptions, and other properties

Plus get started quickly with included template projects for Discord and Mastodon/Pleroma.
detailed_description:
Create news bots, feed aggregators, and more with the RSS Feeds extension pack!

RSS is a web feed protocol that allows its consumers to stay up-to-date on frequently-updated content, like news articles, blogs, and podcasts. This extension pack adds at least a dozen new blocks and the ability to consume RSS feeds directly from your project.

With the Piecewise RSS Feeds add-on, you can:

  • Easily monitor RSS feeds for new items and changes
  • Fetch RSS feed metadata
  • Fetch RSS feed items, descriptions, and other properties

Plus get started quickly with included template projects for Discord and Mastodon/Pleroma.

fullgame.name: Piecewise: build chat bots with blocks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+, Fedora 24+, Debian 8+
  • Processor: Any amd64-capable processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Fedora 34, Debian 10
  • Processor: Any amd64-capable processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon (Universal binary)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon (Universal binary)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Piecewise - RSS Feeds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Create bots that consume RSS feeds - like feed aggregators or news bots - in Piecewise.
